attributes.action: scrap road tax exemption for older vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should older less efficient vehicles be tax exempt whilst others pay higher car tax every year when we own more efficient vehicles.  This exemption should now be scraped if the government can consider charging 4x4 owners more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
